trans-unit.source: The SubjectIdentifier class defines the type of the identifier of a subject, such as a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: SubjectIdentifier 类定义的类型的标识符的一个主题，如<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref>或<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The subject can be identified by the certificate issuer and serial number or the subject key.
trans-unit.target: 可通过证书颁发者和序列号或使用者密钥标识主题。

trans-unit.source: The Type property retrieves the type of subject identifier.
trans-unit.target: 类型属性检索的使用者标识符的类型。

trans-unit.source: The subject can be identified by the certificate issuer and serial number or the subject key.
trans-unit.target: 可通过证书颁发者和序列号或使用者密钥标识主题。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that identifies the type of subject.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref>标识使用者的类型的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The Value property retrieves the value of the subject identifier.
trans-unit.target: Value 属性检索的使用者标识符的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier.Type*> property to determine the type of subject identifier, and use the Value property to retrieve the corresponding value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier.Type*>属性来确定的一种使用者标识符，并使用 Value 属性来检索相应的值。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier.Type*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> object that represents the value of the subject identifier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>对象，表示使用者标识符的值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Object> can be one of the following objects as determined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier.Type*> property. <table><thead><tr><th> <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier.Type*> property
trans-unit.target: 此<xref:System.Object>可以是由以下对象之一<> *1> 属性。 <table><thead><tr><th> <>*> property</xref:System.Object>
